title.narrative: Promoting Human Security through Sustainable Resettlemen

description.narrative: The Promoting Human Security Through Sustainable Resettlement Programme is the primary vehicle for shifting from a humanitarian to a long-term development approach to support the local integration of former refugees and Zambians.

participating-org.narrative: UN Tr Fund for Human Security
US Department of State, Office to monitor & combat Tracking in persons.

document-link.url: https://info.undp.org/docs/pdc/Documents/ZMB/Promoting Human Security Through Sustainable Resettlement in Zambia - Project Document.pdf

title.narrative: Construction of a Police Post in Mayukwayukwa Resettlement Area
Construction of staff houses in Meheba-Mayukwa
ITB/001/2019 - Supply of start-up agricultural inputs, training and additional support - Resettlement Schemes
Rehabilitation and Upgrading of Community Infrastructure in Mayukwayukwa Resettlement Scheme
Request for Proposal - Financial training services
Supply and delivery of 650 energy efficient household cook stoves for Meheba and Mayuwayukwa Resettlement Scheme
Supply and delivery of Agricultural Imputs

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).

description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2018-2021. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to
